actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to increase the aggregate authority for long-term direct loans to nonprofit sponsors for the construction of housing for the elderly and handicapped.

summary.text: Increases by $2,500,000,000, the amount authorized to be appropriated for long-term direct loans to nonprofit sponsors for construction of housing for the elderly and the handicapped.

titles.title: A bill to increase the aggregate authority for long-term direct loans to nonprofit sponsors for the construction of housing for the elderly and handicapped.
